document_data.name: Beckla Shadesar
document_data.mainbody: '''Beckla Shadesar''' was a [[human]] wizard of [[Waterdeep]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

History.Early Life: Around 1324 DR, Beckla took a job working for a moneylender in the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|South Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] of the name [[Vermik]].
History.Undermountain: In the {{YearlinkName|1325}},<ref>{{Cite web/Presenting...Seven Millennia of Realms Fiction}} the young [[Corin Silvertor|Lord Corin Silvertor]] was lost on a hunting trip into [[Undermountain]] below Waterdeep. The [[half-orc]] thief [[Artek Ar'talen]] was hired by Lord [[Darien Thal]] to rescue Lord Silvertor from Undermountain. With the help of Beckla, they located the young nobleman, and the three of them battled their way through Undermountain.

document_data.Description: Becka was described as tall and sleek, with close-cropped brown hair and deep brown eyes. She was not considered pretty, as she had a square jaw and crooked nose. She wore worn leather breeches, a full white shirt, and a gray vest.
document_data.Possessions: Beckla carried an intricately carved staff.
document_data.Abilities: Beckla was a talented wizard, who wished only to expand her skills.
document_data.Relationships: Beckla had warm feelings for Corin Silvertor, and was invited to join him as he returned to Waterdeep.
